episodes.title: Where Stars are Indoctrinated into Scientology -  Special Guest Robbie Levin
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by Special Guest Robbie Levin and tell much more about how Scientology Celebrity Centre began in 1969 by Janis' Mother Yvonne Gillham Jentzsch.  There are lots of never before seen photos included.

This is Part 2 of the story.

In this video, you will hear about how Robbie Levin left the Sea Organization, began a very successful business career and eventually left Scientology altogether.  This created disconnection between Robbie and his brother Geoff who remained in Scientology for many years before finally leaving himself.

As covered in Part 1, Robbie Levin was in a Rock Band called People in the mid 60s along with his brother Geoff Levin and several others.  They found out about Scientology and joined in 1968.   Robbie and his band were there with Yvonne at the very beginnings of Celebrity Centre  in Los Angeles and eventually they joined the Sea Organization while continuing to tour and perform as a rock band.  They eventually left the Sea Organization and Scientology.  

You will also hear Robbie's story about how he left Scientology, got a  repayment of his money still on his account and then went to the Clearwater Sun Newspaper to tell his story once he had left.

The documentary film Brothers Broken about the lives of Robbie and his brother Geoff Levin is touring the country right now.

episodes.title: Scientology - L. Ron Hubbard's Last Public New Years Photos
episodes.description:
Mark FIsher and Janis Gillham Grady share rare photographs of L. Ron Hubbard, Scientology Founder and Cult Leader.   The year was New Years 1980 and Hubbard had a celebration with his Messengers at his secret location in Hemet, Califormia, code named "X".

Shortly thereafter he went on the run with Pat and Annie Broeker and was in hiding for the rest of his life until his death in January 1986.

Also see photos of Janis and her family at that same time in Australia.  She never saw Hubbard again.

We also remember some of our friends and family that we lost over the past 2 years with photos and stories.

episodes.title: Exposing Scientology Abuses in Germany for Years
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady Interview Scientology's Public Enemy #1 in Germany and Europe - Ursula Caberta.  She was a member of the German Parliament when she was alerted to abuses by Scientology in Hamburg, Germany.

She then took it upon herself to learn everything there is to know about L. Ron Hubbard and Scientology and took actions to protect people and expose the abuses of the Scientology Cult in Germany and Europe.

Her actions saved many people from the Scientology Cult and Scientology treated her as their number 1 enemy and targeted her for fair game and attacks.

Ursula is now retired from the Germany government but still provides help and guidance to people involved with Scientology who have since left.

episodes.title: Daring Escape and Abuse Stories from the Scientology Freewinds
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by Scott and Karry Campbell with more stories about abuses on the Scientology Ship Freewinds and a video story regarding a daring escape from the ship.

Life on the Freewinds started to get darker and darker after Janis Gillham Grady left the ship for the last time and David Miscavige and the International Association of Scientologists took over.   Public Scientologists were used and abused, making them donate large sums of money to Scientology, using the public's own confessions in counseling and training against them.

Crew members and International Scientology executives were ordered to clean the bilges of the ship as punishment ordered by Miscavige.

Finally, you will see a short video story about the daring escape of a Sea Organization Executive who was being held against his will on the ship and how Scientology tried to track him down and bring him back into the Sea Organization.

This is another is our series on the Scientology Ship -Freewinds.

episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady interview former Scientologist and Sea Organization member Tom Defour about his escape in the late 1970s from L. Ron Hubbard's secret La Quinta, California location on foot, never to return again.

Hear about how he got into Scientology and the Sea Organization as a teenager, working directly with L. Ron Hubbard on audio/visual projects.  He then became unhappy with the abuses he saw going on in the desert location and left.    Hear how he started his life over, started a family and a business.

episodes.title: Scientology Ship - Maiden Voyage with Scott & Karry Campbell & Tom Martiniano
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by their guests to discuss the preparations for the Maiden Voyage of the Scientology Ship - Freewinds in June 1988.

Janis Gillham Grady was in charge of getting the ship and it's crew ready for the Maiden Voyage.

Scott & Karry Campbell were crew on the ship.  Scott was an Engineer in the Engine Room and Karry was the Chief Steward for the crew.

Tom Martiniano was in charge of setting up the Service Organization that would deliver the new Operating Thetan Level 8 for the first time.

They tell stories about setting up the ship and the successful Maiden Voyage including many photographs.  This is Part 3 of the series of videos on the Freewinds.

episodes.title: How Did Growing Up in Scientology Affect Raising Children After Leaving?
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by Claire Headley for a Live Stream discussion.   Saturday -2 pm EST/11 am PST

Both Janis and Claire were born into a Scientology family and were raised in Scientology and the Sea Organization, working for L. Ron Hubbard.   No real formal education.   Everything they learned as a child, was in Scientology.

After both leaving the cult and having their own children, how did their earlier life in Scientology affect raising their own children?

Join us for what we hope is an interesting and informative discussion.

episodes.title: Our Scientology Stories - Tribute to Kerry Gleeson  with Mike Rinder and Friends
episodes.description:
Kerry Gleeson was an important figure in Scientology and the Sea Organization in the 1970s and early 1980s rising to the postion of Executive Director International for Scientology.  After leaving Scientology in 1983, Kerry had a very successful career in business and eventually a happy retirement with his wife Jill Gleeson and their 3 daughters.

Sadly, Kerry passed away last week on October 10, 2023.  Janis is close friend of Kerry and his wife Jill.

This is a tribute to Kerry Gleeson by some of his friends from his years in Scientology, who he remained in touch with during the years afterwards.
Kerry was a bigger than life personality with a very caring heart.

Our Special Guests include Mike Rinder, Ira Chaleff Karen De La Carriere and Hana Eltringham Whitfield, who will tell stories about Kerry and his importance in the lives of many people.

episodes.title: Scientology's Steve Jobs? - Foster Tompkins Story wirh Sterling Tompkins & Jeff Hawkins
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by special guests Sterling Tompkins and Jeff Hawkins to tell the story of Sterling's Father - Foster Tompkins.

Foster is still in the Sea Organization and has been disconnected from his family who left Scientology for many years.   Foster also was way ahead of his time when it came to Computerization.    He saw the potential of using computers in the mid 1970s and was the person who set up the computerization of Scientology in the early 1980's with the establishment of INCOMM - International Network of Computer Organized ManageMent.

Since then he fell out of favor with David Miscavige and reportedly has been working for years in the furniture manuafacturing area at the Los Angeles Big Blue Complex.

Hear his story from one of Foster's best friends, Jeff Hawkins and one of his sons, Sterling Tompkins.

episodes.title: Scientology & Hubbard Locked Up Janis Gillham Grady!
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by their guest Tom Defour, a former Sea Organization and Scientology member.

Tom was with Janis when she was locked in a room for 11 days at the orders of Hubbard in 1978 at the secret location called "W" in LaQuinta, California because Janis reportedly had "Evil Purposes" towards Mary Sue Hubbard and was a "Rockslammer".

This of course was ridiculous since Janis had been with Hubbard since she was 12 years old, everyday for 6 hours a day for many years.  A dedicated Sea Org member at the time.

Tom Defour had been assigned the task of guarding Janis when she was locked up and instead of doing so, he "blew" Scientology (left) without telling anyone because of his disagreement with what was being done.

This is the first time Tom and Janis have seen each other is 45 years on this video.   We also cover how Tom got involved in Scientology and the Sea Organization as a young man and his work on the Sea Organization Ships located in the Southern California area - the Ares, Bolivar and Excalibur.

Never before seen photos of Janis, L. Ron Hubbard & Family and the secret location in LaQuinta, California.

episodes.title: Interview - Danielle Chamberlin - Abused as a 12 year old on the Flagship Apollo.
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by their guest Danielle Chamberlin from the UK.   

Danielle tells her story of being sent alone to the Sea Organization ship Apollo- as a 12 year old with no parent or guardian.  She suffered both physical and mental abuse at the hands of L. Ron Hubbard and others on the ship.    Danielle wasn't a Messenger  for Hubbard but instead worked in the ships galley and other areas doing manual labor without any adult looking after her.

Assigned to the Rehabilitation Project Force as a child and then later locked in the dark, dirty, dangerous chain locker for days as a punishment.  She finally left the ship and went back to England.

You will hear about L. Ron Hubbard's days in Rhodesia (Zimbabwe)  where he was eventually thrown out of the country by the government.

You will also hear about Danielle's life after leaving the Apollo and working in Scientology for several years before finally leaving.

Danielle is a loyal supporter and member of our channel.

episodes.title: From Sea Organization to Runway: Fashion Designers Share Their Journey | Live Stream
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined for a live stream interview with world renown Fashion Designers and former Sea Organization members Claudio Lugli and his wife Renata Lugli.

Claudio and Renata helped to build Scientology in Italy in the later 70's and 80's.  They left the Sea Organization in 1982, but got back in good standing and remained public Scientologists until 2010 when they left the Church.

In the meantime, starting from nothing in 1982, they created a Fashion business in Italy that is known throughout the world.   They designed clothes for many celebrities and sports figures.

They became close personal friends with jazz greats Chick Corea, Stanley Clarke, Tommy Brechtlien as well as actress Kirstie Alley.

They also became the personal designers for David Miscavige and his wife Shelly Miscavige.

One of their sons, Tiziano Lugli, is a professional fashion photographer and recording artist.

Their other son, Flavio is still in the Sea Organization at the Flag Land Base and has been disconnected from his family since 2010.

Watch this live interview from Italy Saturday at 3:30 PM EDT/12:30 PM PDT.

For more information on Claudio Lugli Fashion Design:
https://www.claudiolugli.it/

episodes.title: Sea Organization Members stuck on shore in Spain!  Part 2 of the story.
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are joined by special guest - Neville Chamberlin.

This is Part 2 of the hilarious story of Sea Organization members "invading" Spain during lifeboat missions and drills in 1968!

The crew is confined to the beach and left to play Leap Frog and enjoy a lovely buffet of stale saltine crackers and barley sugar!  LOL

After a night sleeping in an empty restaurant, the brave crew are returned  to their ship offshore and welcomed by Captain Mary Sue Hubbard and the Officers of the Royal Scotman to continue the Liability cruise.

Hear the hilarious story and see the exclusive photographs - courtesy of Sylvia Calhoun- of their adventure.

episodes.title: Personal Reflections on L. Ron Hubbard  & Scientology -with Ken Urquhart
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady bring back by popular demand, Ken Urquhart for another interview.   Ken knew L. Ron Hubbard and worked for him for many years.   Part 4 in their series with Ken.

They cover Standing Order #1 by L. Ron Hubbard concerning all mail addressed to him, being received by him and how the letters were answered and handled.  Many Scientologists wrote letters to Ron over the years and Ken talks about answering those letters.

Mark, Janis and Ken then get into a discussion about Ken's personal reflections and viewpoints about L. Ron Hubbard - the man whom Ken served as Butler, Personal Communicator and then worked for many years as a Scientology Counselor (Auditor), delivering Scientology counseling developed by Hubbard, to many people all over the world.  

Where did Hubbard succeed and where did he fail?

What about Hubbard's abuses, mistakes and lies about himself and his history?  

Hear Ken Urquhart's viewpoints on these subjects.

episodes.description:
Janis Gillham Grady welcomes an old friend - Neville Chamberlin to talk about his early life in Scientology in London, Saint Hill and the beginning of the secret Sea Project, which later became the Sea Organization. Mark Fisher joins Janis for the interview.

Neville started in Scientology in 1954 and continued for many years.  He was staff at Saint Hill and tells his stories about his first voyages in the Sea Project on the ships - Avon River and Enchanter - with L. Ron Hubbard.

This video also includes several photographs from that time period.

Neville also met and knew the Miscavige family when they came to Saint Hill in England in the early 1970s.

This is Part One of Neville Chamberlin's interview.

episodes.title: How Scientology and Anonymous Collided: Inside the Internet Battle with Mitch Brisker
episodes.description:
Anonymous began an internet attack on Scientology in 2008 after Scientology tried to suppress free speech by forcing the internet to take down a video interview with Tom Cruise.   This led to worldwide protests by Anonymous, joined by former Scientologists and Sea Organization members, speaking out against the many abuses by the cult.  Thousands of people protested in front of Scientology Buildings worldwide.

What was Scientology's response?  

Special Guest Mitch Brisker was closely involved in David Miscavige's counter attack against Anonymous and the protesters as part of the inner circle of Scientology executives and professionals advising Miscavige.  Hear what was happening behind the scenes.

This stream will also include a general discussion about Scientology and their many mistakes in dealing with the internet over the years.

Join Mark Fisher, Janis Grady and Special Guest Mitch Brisker for this Live Stream.

episodes.title: Former Scientology Film Director Mitch Brisker Speaks Out
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady interview former Scientology Film Director Mitch Brisker.  Brisker is a professional film director who was hired by Scientology in 1990 to Direct all of L. Ron Hubbard's Technical and Public Films at the Golden Era Productions base and continued as their Film Director for 28 years. He then worked for Scientology Media Productions - the Scientology TV Network for 2 years.

Hear Brisker's stories about filming at the Gold Base with the Sea Organization Film Crew.  During that time, he worked with many people and interacted with Scientology Leader David Miscavige.

Brisker also tells about his chance meeting running into Shelly Miscavige sometime in 2008, after she had disappeared.  He also discusses the last time he saw former Scientology President Heber Jentzsch.

Brisker covers the return of Marty Rathbun under Miscavige's and Scientology's control when Rathbun did his interviews attacking Leah Remini, Mike Rinder as well as others.

He also tells a humorous story about working with Mark Headley at the Gold Base and how competent Mark is.

This is Part 1 of our interviews with Mitch Brisker.  There are some camera issues with Mitch's camera, but the audio is clear and well worth watching this video.

episodes.title: Scientology - Creation of the Rehabilitation Project Force - Ken Urquhart Interview - Part 3
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady interview former Scientology Executive and Sea Organization member - Ken Urquhart about the creation of the Rehabilitation Project Force (RPF) Scientology's internal prison force.   

Urquhart wrote the original Sea Organization Policy creating the RPF under the direction of L. Ron Hubbard.  Find out why it was created, what the purpose was, how long it was supposed to take to graduate and much more. The RPF was a major form of abuse in Scientology.  

Hear how the time in the RPF was greatly increased through the sadistic and abusive orders of David Miscavige.  Graduation used to take a matter of weeks, but became a matter of years under Miscavige.

Urquhart also talks about his own experiences when he was later assigned to the RPF himself in the late 1970s.

Urquhart also discuses his regrets for having created the RPF.

episodes.description:

Mark came back to try and convince his wife to leave with him.   She was turned against him and would not leave.  Mark then finally escaped in September 1990 for good.  Mark and Gary have never talked about those escapes.  Learn what Miscavige, RTC and Security were thinking and doing when Mark took off.

episodes.title: Ken Urquhart - Former  L. Ron Hubbard Personal Communicator Interview
episodes.description:
Mark Fisher and Janis Gillham Grady are excited to welcome Ken Urquhart  to Our Scientology Stories - Peeling the Onion.   Ken got into Scientology in 1957 and later became L. Ron Hubbard's personal Butler at Saint Hill Manor in England.   He eventually was promoted to LRH Personal Communicator and worked daily with Hubbard for many years at Saint Hill, on the Flagship Apollo and at the Flag Land Base in Clearwater, Florida.

Ken tells stories of the early days at Saint Hill including working as a Butler for Hubbard and his family and the party for the first Clear at Saint Hill.  

See rarely seen photographs of life at Saint Hill in England.  Ken is now 85 years old, living in Scotland having left the Church of Scientology in the early 80s, having been declared a Suppressive Person by David Miscavige. 

This is the first of a series of interviews with Ken.  He is also widely known as the writer of the policy creating the Rehabilitation Project Force (RPF) on the Flagship Apollo.   We will be interviewing him about that in a future video.
